thread.section_title: KISA Phone Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of KISA Phone | kisaphone.com.au
thread.title: Janko Lapic
thread.title_full: KISA Phone reviewed by Janko Lapic

author: Janko Lapic
title: Janko Lapic
text: Cant complain. Bought a phone for my elderly dad and its no problem for him to use. The whole process was 'no fuss' and easy to set up. The only thing that i can say is the buttons can be accidentally pressed, even with the cover add-on. Not a big problem but a problem. Other than that, still recommend the KISA Phone.
